hero.title: Build Modern Landing Pages Faster
hero.subtitle: LND Boilerplate
hero.description: A comprehensive landing page boilerplate with monorepo architecture, built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Start building beautiful, performant websites in minutes.

features.title: Why Choose LND Boilerplate?
features.description: Built with modern best practices and designed for developer productivity.

modernArchitecture.title: Modern Architecture
modernArchitecture.description: Built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS for optimal performance and developer experience.

componentLibrary.title: Component Library
componentLibrary.description: Reusable UI components organized in tiers: primitives, compositions, and templates.

mdxSupport.title: MDX Support
mdxSupport.description: Full MDX support for content management with custom components and frontmatter.

monorepoStructure.title: Monorepo Structure
monorepoStructure.description: Organized packages for UI components and utilities with workspace management.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your needs. All plans include core features and updates.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small projects and experiments.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large organizations with custom needs.

errors.notFoundDescription: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
errors.internalErrorDescription: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
